markdownRemark.html:
Mobile-accessible scorecard and meeting agenda web application. Imports data from Google Sheets using the Google Sheets API and displays it in a React web app.

I designed and developed this proof-of-concept for the Broadband Networks Leadership Team as a member of the Broadband Networks Business Intelligence Team.
